ms_copies_parts: Prague, Národni Muzeum, XLIC-97, 'Num. 3'. The first movement is entitled 'Larchetto alla francese'.
sources.first_edition: April, 1773, Paris, Vénier: Op. 11 no. 6 (for title, see No. 177).
later_editions: (c. 1773), Venice, Marescalchi-Canobbio: no. 3 (for title, see No. 180).
